group_1.textLeft: And do you *still* want to be a film director@some day?

group_1.textRight: Yeah! Of course.
I mean, you let me know just now...
...That we have similar sensibilities, right?
I'm going to prove to everyone...
That Director Joey's artistic sense was the@real deal!
Oh, but...@I guess my movie's not up to snuff, huh?
You did give a lot of critique just now,@after all...

group_1.textLeft: …………[wait:1.0][chara:800700:cheek_0][chara:800700:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:800700:lipSynch_1]Yeah.@You've got a long way to go, kiddo.
But... the only thing I meant to critique was@the technical quality.
...Is something you can perfect if you study@it good and hard.
So it looks like you've got a lot of studying@ahead of you!

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
…………[wait:1.0][chara:303901:cheek_0][chara:303901:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:303901:lipSynch_1]Eh?
Wait, d'you mean...

group_1.textLeft: He's saying you'd better get to work studying@useful film techniques!

group_1.textRight: ...Dad!

group_1.textLeft: You can replicate my brother's work, but *not*@the awful ending. Alright?

group_1.textRight: Got it!
...And thus, I received my dad's permission to@enter the design department.

group_1.textLeft: In that case, it's no wonder you didn't wish@for film sense from Kyubey.

group_1.textRight: Exactly.
I want to win with my own artistic sense!

group_1.textLeft: And so, you wished for production funds.

group_1.textRight: ...I'm going to need both funding and luck.
I'm well aware of that...

group_1.textLeft: Seeing as you had such an earnest wish...
...Perhaps it was inevitable that you'd meet@Kyubey.

group_1.textRight: ...Do you think so?@Now that I look back on it...
I feel like I just ran with my assumption that@he was some kind of alien life-form...
...And wasn't really thinking that hard about it.

group_1.textLeft: I feel like you *should've* thought about it...

group_1.textRight: But, well! I think that this all turned out@quite alright anyway.
I became a Magical Girl, got to know two very@kind senpais...
And settled down in the comfort of our very own@Historical Research Club!

group_1.textLeft: I suppose it's true that our Historical@Research Club...
...Is just about the only one where you could@spend an entire day on film production.

group_1.textRight: ...Still feeling kind of conflicted about@that, honestly.

group_1.textCenter: It may not be all that obvious, but I really@am very thankful to my senpais!
